content.text: Match ends, Recreativo 0, Almería 1.
Second Half ends, Recreativo 0, Almería 1.
Substitution, Almería. García Márquez replaces Rafita.
Attempt blocked. Fidel (Recreativo) header from the centre of the box is blocked. Assisted by Manolo Martínez with a headed pass.
Foul by Aarón Ñíguez (Almería).
Ximo Navarro (Recreativo) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Javi Álamo (Recreativo).

Henok Goitom (Almería) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
